creator: Group6ofS21
title: PAINT TOOL SAI COLORING TUTORIAL - for beginners
description: A tutorial explaining how to color line art with shading using the Paint Tool SAI software. It is a computer subject machine project.
steps: Open line art image in Paint Tool SAI.
Use Paint Tool SAI tools and techniques to add color to the line art.
Apply shading to the colored line art to enhance depth and dimension.
The tutorial video will help guide you through the coloring process.
